citation.title: Empirical interatomic potential for silicon with improved elastic properties
citation.abstract: An alternative parametrization is given for a previous empirical interatomic potential for silicon. The new potential is designed to more accurately reproduce the elastic properties of silicon, which were poorly described in the earlier potential. The properties of liquid Si are also improved, but energies of surfaces are less accurate. Detailed tests of the new potential are described.

notes.text: This is Tersoff's Si(C) potential, which was an alternative parameterization for improved elastic constants.
This file was created and verified by Lucas Hale. It has identical parameter values as the Si(C) model in the SiCGe.tersoff file in the August 22, 2018 LAMMPS distribution.
Listing found at https://openkim.org.  This KIM potential is based on a parameter file with identical parameter values as 1988--Tersoff-J--Si-c--LAMMPS--ipr1.
